sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"your-skills-title"}}>{`Your skill's title`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://greenkeeper.io/"}}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"src":"https://badges.greenkeeper.io/sprucelabsai/sprucebot-skills-kit.svg","alt":"Greenkeeper badge"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>{`
Describe the experience you wish to create from the perspective of the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`guest`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`owner`}</MDXTag>{`, or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`teammate`}</MDXTag>{`...`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"technical-overview"}}>{`Technical overview`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Describe how your skill works for anyone who may need to come in and maintain or add to it. Example; Hooks into `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`did-enter`}</MDXTag>{` and sends a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`message`}</MDXTag>{` to a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`teammate`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"services"}}>{`Services`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`vip`}</MDXTag>{` - Tells us who to send to.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"utilities"}}>{`Utilities`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`rewards`}</MDXTag>{` - Does something else.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"sequelize-adapter"}}>{`Sequelize Adapter`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Allow your skill to an external sql database.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`In .env enable with `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`DB_ENABLED=true`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Configure the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`DB_MIGRATIONS=true`}</MDXTag>{` to enable automatically running migrations`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Create `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`server/models/Example.js`}</MDXTag>{` from `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`.example`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Setup a migration to build the table in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`server/migrations/*_example.js#up()`}</MDXTag>{` from `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="li">{`.example`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`All of your models are available via koa `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ctx.db.models.Example.*`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ctx.db.sequelize.*`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`We also ship with four "Core" models
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ctx.db.models.User`}</MDXTag>{`
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ctx.db.models.Location`}</MDXTag>{`
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ctx.db.models.UserLocation`}</MDXTag>{`
`}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`ctx.db.models.Organization`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"custom-events"}}>{`Custom events`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Describe any custom events your skill emits. Make sure you include whether or not it honors `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`preventDefault`}</MDXTag>{` and include the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`payload`}</MDXTag>{`'s schema.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"vip-alertswill-send"}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="h4">{`vip-alerts:will-send`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Just before a vip alert is triggered when a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`guest`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`teammate`}</MDXTag>{` arrives. Honors `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`preventDefault`}</MDXTag>{`. Mutate `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`messages`}</MDXTag>{` to your heart's content. Whatever `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`messages`}</MDXTag>{` you return will be what is sent.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Payload`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`;[
    {
        teammateId: UUID4, // teammate receiving the alert
        body: String // the message
    },
    {
        teammateId: UUID4, // teammate receiving the alert
        body: String // the message
    }
]
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"will-send-training"}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="h4">{`will-send-training`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This event can be configured to remind teammates to do something, or if none of the settings are set yet, remind the owner to either finish their settings or turn off the skill.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Payload`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`{
    teammate: ctx.event, // teammate receiving the alert
    body: String // the message
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"my-slugcustom-event"}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="h4">{`my-slug:custom-event`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is just a placeholder for now, put in yours! Honors `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`preventDefault`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Payload`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js"}}>{`{
    hello: 'world'
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"gotchyas"}}>{`Gotchya's`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Describe anything else dev's should know when working on your skill.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"credits"}}>{`Credits`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`John Doe`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Billy Joe`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Tom Snow`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
MDXContent.isMDXComponent = true
